document_data.name: Elonn
document_data.mainbody: '''Elonn''' was a young laborer in a small town of [[Faerûn]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, who was sold into slavery by one of the [[Red Wizards]].
document_data.Description: Elonn was a strong young man, in great physical shape.
document_data.History: In the middle of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, one of the [[wizard]]s from a local Red Wizard enclave, led by a woman named [[Hinnar]], began selling locals into slavery of her own initiative. This underling, [[Kizzaf]], disguised herself with a wig and [[charm]]ed victims to follow her out of town. Elonn and his companion Talf were two such victims and, after visiting a tavern one day, were seen following a "long-haired woman" from the town while laughing along with her. Kizzaf drugged Talf and Elonn and sold them to a [[Thay]]an merchant named [[Mahzed]]. Their fates are unknown.
